title: Anti-Cheater Strategies - Novel Updates

description: Ever since an NPC named Shu ChunChun, had been taken advantage of and used carelessly by the world-hoppers, awakened her consciousness, she knew that the only way to drive out the world-hoppers was to make them fall for her, HARD.>
